author: markekraus
body:
Now that #4622 has been merged. HTTPS based tests (currently using badssl.com) for the WebCmdlets should be moved to the WebListener and no longer rely on external sites. The HTTPS based tests should be grouped under a new context.

References #2504

comments.author: markekraus
comments.body: @iSazonov @SteveL-MSFT  @TravisEz13  You can assign this one to me. I should have a PR for it this weekend.

title: Move WebCmdlet Tests relying on HTTPS to WebListener Module
